file.content:
This is a [Next.js](https://nextjs.org) project bootstrapped with [`create-next-app`](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/cli/create-next-app).

## Getting Started

First, run the development server:

```bash
npm run dev
# or
yarn dev
# or
pnpm dev
# or
bun dev
```

Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) with your browser to see the result.

You can start editing the page by modifying `app/page.tsx`. The page auto-updates as you edit the file.

This project uses [`next/font`](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/optimizing/fonts) to automatically optimize and load [Geist](https://vercel.com/font), a new font family for Vercel.

## Learn More

To learn more about Next.js, take a look at the following resources:

- [Next.js Documentation](https://nextjs.org/docs) - learn about Next.js features and API.
- [Learn Next.js](https://nextjs.org/learn) - an interactive Next.js tutorial.

You can check out [the Next.js GitHub repository](https://github.com/vercel/next.js) - your feedback and contributions are welcome!

## Deploy on Vercel

The easiest way to deploy your Next.js app is to use the [Vercel Platform](https://vercel.com/new?utm_medium=default-template&filter=next.js&utm_source=create-next-app&utm_campaign=create-next-app-readme) from the creators of Next.js.

Check out our [Next.js deployment documentation](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/deploying) for more details.

content.thinking:
Perfect! Now I have a good understanding. The project is called "our-pot" (version 2.0.0) and it's a Next.js application with:
- AI SDK integration (OpenAI)
- SQLite database support (Capacitor)
- Android mobile support (Capacitor)
- React with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Various UI components from Radix UI

Based on the name "our-pot" and the technologies used, this appears to be a collaborative financial tracking or money pooling app, possibly for shared expenses or group savings. It has mobile support via Capacitor and AI integration.

Now let me list the files in the root directory nicely and provide the 2-sentence summary.

content.text:
**Files in root directory:**
- `android/` - Android app directory (Capacitor)
- `app/` - Next.js app directory
- `build-android-production.sh` - Build script for Android
- `capacitor.config.ts` - Capacitor configuration
- `claude.md` - Project guidelines
- `components/` - Reusable React components
- `components.json` - Component configuration
- `eslint.config.mjs` - ESLint configuration
- `jest.config.js` - Jest testing configuration
- `jest.setup.ts` - Jest setup
- `lib/` - Utility libraries and data logic
- `next.config.ts` - Next.js configuration
- `package.json` - Dependencies and scripts
- `package-lock.json` - Lock file
- `postcss.config.mjs` - PostCSS configuration
- `public/` - Static assets
- `README.md` - Documentation
- `tsconfig.json` - TypeScript configuration
- `.git/` - Git repository
- `.github/` - GitHub configuration
- `.gitignore` - Git ignore rules

**Project Summary:**
"Our Pot" is a full-stack Next.js application that provides collaborative financial management with AI-powered features, supporting both web and mobile (Android) platforms. The app uses SQLite for data persistence, React for the UI, and integrates OpenAI for intelligent functionality.

---

DONE

- No files changed

- None

## PR / Branch
- None
